featured.text: They periodically stopped their conversations to switch tables so the insights and ideas might 13 and deepen.
It is believed that taking breaks from a problem can help 17 a moment of insight or stimulate new ideas.
They broke into small, intimate table conversations, recording their insights on paper tablecloths.
Studies on jackdaws and turtle ants may provide some insights into the issue.

definition.zh_def: 洞察力；深刻的理解或見解
definition.en_def: The capacity to gain an accurate and deep understanding of someone or something.
definition.example: Her insight into human behavior helped her become a successful psychologist.
